requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 1.7Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 2.3Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
